title: Sum Calculator
code:
§begin sum_array
  numbers ← [5, 10, 15, 20]
  total ← 0
  §iterate num §in numbers
    total ← total ⊕ num
  §end_iterate
  §transmit total
§end
solution_description: calculates the sum of all numbers in an array
hints: total starts at 0 and accumulates values
Each number is added to the running total
This is a classic sum algorithm
